meaning: Normal component of the electric displacement field

name: 1 semi.Ec0
formula:
# semi.chi0: Electron affinity in V

-V - semi.chi0
meaning: Conduction band energy level without bandgap narrowing

name: 4 semi.Dp_up
formula:
# semi.mup: Hole mobility
# semi.Vth : Thermal potential
# semi.Gp: ???

up(semi.mup) * semi.Vth * up(semi.Gp)

name: 5 semi.Vp_up
formula:
# semi.mup: Hole mobility
# semi.E_up: ???
# semi.grad_chi_up: Normal electric field shift due to band gap narrowing
# semi.grad_Eg_up: Normal electric field shift due to band gap narrowing
# semi.Dp_th_up: Hole thermal diffusion coefficient, upside
# semi.Tl: Lattice temperature
# semi.dngX: ???
# semi.dngY: ???

up(semi.mup) * semi.E_up - up(semi.mup) * (semi.grad_chi_up + semi.grad_Eg_up) - semi.Dp_th_up * (d(semi.Tl,X) * semi.dngX + d(semi.Tl,Y) * semi.dngY) / semi.Tl
meaning: SG up hole conservative convective velocity

name: 6 semi.Dn_up
formula:
# semi.mun: electron mobility
# semi.Vth : Thermal potential

up(semi.mun) * semi.Vth * up(semi.Gn)

name: 7 semi.Vn_up
formula:
# semi.mun: electron mobility
# semi.E_up: ???
# semi.grad_chi_up: Normal electric field shift due to band gap narrowing
# semi.grad_Eg_up: Normal electric field shift due to band gap narrowing
# semi.Dp_th_up: Hole thermal diffusion coefficient, upside
# semi.Tl: Lattice temperature
# semi.dngX: ???
# semi.dngY: ???

up(semi.mun) * semi.E_up - up(semi.mun) * semi.grad_chi_up + semi.Dn_th_up * (d(semi.Tl,X) * semi.dngX + d(semi.Tl,Y) * semi.dngY) / semi.Tl
meaning: SG up electron conservative convective velocity

name: 8 semi.Nv_init
meaning: Effective density of states, valence band for initialization

name: 9 semi.Nv_T0
formula:
# semi.Nv: Effective density of states, valence band

subst(semi.Nv, semi.smm1.minput_temperature, semi.T0)
meaning: Effective density of states, valence band at equilibrium reference temperature

name: 10 semi.Nc_init
meaning: Effective density of states, conduction band for initialization

meaning: Effective density of states, conduction band at equilibrium reference temperature

name: 32 semi.normJn
formula: sqrt( realdot(semi.JnX, semi.JnX) + realdot(semi.JnY, semi.JnY) + realdot(semi.JnZ, semi.JnZ))

name: 33 semi.normE
formula: sqrt( realdot(semi.EX, semi.EX) + realdot(semi.EY, semi.EY) + realdot(semi.EZ, semi.EZ))

name: 34 semi.normD
formula: sqrt( realdot(semi.DX, semi.DX) + realdot(semi.DY, semi.DY) + realdot(semi.DZ, semi.DZ))

name: 104 semi.Efp
formula:
# semi.Ev: Valence band energy level
# semi.Vth: Thermal potential
# semi.P_num: Hole concentration
# semi.gamma_p: ???
# semi.Nv: Effective density of states, valence band

semi.Ev - semi.Vth * log(semi.P_num/(semi.gamma_p * semi.Nv))

name: 105 semi.Ev0_e
formula:
# semi.Ev0: Valence band energy level without bandgap narrowing

semi.Ev0  * e_const
meaning: Valence band energy level without bandgap narrowing

name: 106 semi.Eg
formula:
# semi.Eg0: Band gap
# semi.deltaEg: Band gap narrowing voltage

semi.Eg0 - semi.deltaEg

name: 115 semi.chi_semi
formula:
# semi.chi0: Electron affinity in V

# semi.deltaEg: Band gap narrowing voltage

semi.chi0 + semi.alpha * semi.deltaEg

name: 116 semi.chi0_e
formula:
# semi.chi0: Electron affinity in V

semi.chi0 * e_const

name: 157 semi.Vth_T0
meaning: Thermal potential at equilibrium reference temperature

name: 159 semi.n_eq
formula:
# semi.Ndoping = Signed dopant concentration
# ni_mode = Modified intrinsic carrier concentration for mass action law

if(semi.Ndoping > 0):
    semi.n_eq = 0.5 * semi.Ndoping + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping)^2 + semi.ni_mod^2)
else:
    semi.n_eq = semi.ni_mod^2 / (-0.5 * semi.Ndoping + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping)^2 + semi.ni_mod^2))

name: 160 semi.p_eq
formula:
# semi.Ndoping = Signed dopant concentration
# ni_mode = Modified intrinsic carrier concentration for mass action law

if(semi.Ndoping < 0):
    semi.p_eq = -0.5 * semi.Ndoping + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping)^2 + semi.ni_mod^2)
else:
    semi.p_eq = semi.ni_mod^2 / (0.5 * semi.Ndoping + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping)^2 + semi.ni_mod^2)))

name: 161 semi.n_init
formula:
# semi.Ndoping_init = Signed dopant concentration for initialization
# semi.ni_init = itIntrinsic carrier concentration for initialization

if(semi.Ndoping_init > 0):
    0.5 * semi.Ndoping_init + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping_init)^2 + semi.ni_init^2)
else:
    semi.ni_init^2/(-0.5 * semi.Ndoping_init + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping_init)^2+semi.ni_init^2))

name: 162 semi.p_init
formula:
# semi.Ndoping_init = Signed dopant concentration for initialization
# semi.ni_init = itIntrinsic carrier concentration for initialization

if(semi.Ndoping_init < 0):
    -0.5 * semi.Ndoping_init + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping_init)^2 + semi.ni_init^2)
else:
    semi.ni_init^2/(0.5 * semi.Ndoping_init + sqrt((0.5*semi.Ndoping_init)^2 + semi.ni_init^2))

name: 164 semi.nSGp_denom_num
meaning: Numerical denominator for SG normal current for holes

name: 165 semi.nSGn_denom_num
meaning: Numerical denominator for SG normal current for electrons

name: 166 semi.nCp_denom_num
formula:
# semi.nCp_denom_num: Numerical denominator for centered difference normal current for holes
# semi.nCp_denom: Denominator for centered difference normal current for holes
# semi.nC_denom_tol: Tolerance for centered difference normal current denominator

if(abs(semi.nCp_denom) < semi.nC_denom_tol)
    if(sign(semi.nCp_denom)==0):
        semi.nCp_denom_num = semi.nC_denom_tol
    else:
        semi.nCp_denom_num = sign(semi.nCp_denom)*semi.nC_denom_tol)
else: 
    semi.nCp_denom_num = semi.nCp_denom)
meaning: Numerical denominator for centered difference normal current for holes

name: 167 semi.nCn_denom_num
formula:
# semi.nCn_denom_num: Numerical denominator for centered difference normal current for electrons
# semi.nCn_denom: Denominator for centered difference normal current for electrons
# semi.nC_denom_tol: Tolerance for centered difference normal current denominator

if(abs(semi.nCn_denom) < semi.nC_denom_tol):
    if(sign(semi.nCn_denom)==0):
        semi.nCn_denom_num = semi.nC_denom_tol
    else:
        semi.nCn_denom_num = sign(semi.nCn_denom)*semi.nC_denom_tol
else:
    semi.nCn_denom
meaning: Numerical denominator for centered difference normal current for electrons

meaning: Interior upside flux for elshdivvar element

name: 205 semi.Jn_drift_post_ext_down
formula:
if(isdefined(semi.nE)){
    value = semi.nE
} else {
    value = (down(V)-semi.nV)/semi.dc_down)

}

e_const * down(semi.mun) * value - d(semi.chi_semi,X) * semi.dngX - d(semi.chi_semi,Y) * semi.dngY) * down(semi.N)




// e_const * down(semi.mun) * (if(isdefined(semi.nE),semi.nE,(down(V)-semi.nV)/semi.dc_down)-
// d(semi.chi_semi,X)*semi.dngX-d(semi.chi_semi,Y)*semi.dngY)*down(semi.N)
meaning: Exterior downside flux for elshdivvar element

name: 207 semi.nCp
formula: e_const * ( semi.Dp_down * (down(semi.P) -up(semi.P)) /semi.nCp_denom_num + 0.5 * (down(semi.P) * (semi.dc_down * (semi.dc_down + 2 * semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down/semi.Dp_up) * semi.Vp_down + semi.Vp_up * (semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down/semi.Dp_up)^2) + up(semi.P) * (semi.dc_down^2 * semi.Vp_down + semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down * (2 * semi.dc_down + semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down / semi.Dp_up) * semi.Vp_up/semi.Dp_up))/semi.nCp_denom_num^2)
meaning: Centered difference normal current for holes

name: 208 semi.nCn
meaning: Centered difference normal current for electrons

name: 210 semi.Vp_down
formula: down(semi.mup) * semi.E_down - down(semi.mup) * (semi.grad_chi_down + semi.grad_Eg_down) -semi.Dp_th_down * ( d(semi.Tl, X) * semi.dngX + d(semi.Tl, Y) * semi.dngY) / semi.Tl
meaning: SG down hole conservative convective velocity

name: 212 semi.Vn_down
formula: down(semi.mun) * semi.E_down - down(semi.mun) * semi.grad_chi_down + semi.Dn_th_down * (d(semi.Tl, X) * semi.dngX + d(semi.Tl, Y) * semi.dngY) / semi.Tl
meaning: SG down electron conservative convective velocity
